com

Class Manager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.Manager

  • public class Manager
extends java.lang.Object
    A global class that has the index of all the Entities. It controls updating the Entities and multithreading.
    Author:
    Christopher Dombroski

    • Method Detail

      • addEntity

        public static int addEntity(java.lang.String name,
            short type,
            java.lang.String fileName)
        Add an Entity into the buffer.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the Entity
        type - What type the Entity is. e.g. "shape" or "spring"
        fileName - The model filename
        Returns:
        The index of the Entity

      • enableEntity

        public static void enableEntity(java.lang.String name,
                boolean enable)
        Enable the Entity. If it is disabled, it will still be present in RAM but not used
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the Entity
        enable -

      • getEntity

        public static Entity getEntity(java.lang.String name)
        Return the Entity with the supplied name.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the Entity
        Returns:
        The Entity

      • removeEntity

        public static void removeEntity(java.lang.String name)
        Remove an Entity from the buffer.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the Entity

      • update

        public static void update()
        Update all the Entities. Updating includes orientation, sector mapping, and collision detection.
